item.title: Manage tmux sessions with tmuxp
item.description: To manage tmux sessions, I like to use tmuxp. It works by having pre-defined sessions in ~/.config/tmuxp which looks like this: session_name: cool-app start_directory: ~/projects/cool-app windows: - window_name: backend start_directory: backend - window_name: frontend start_directory: frontend In case the name of the file is cool-app.yaml, you can open the sessions with tmuxp load cool-app --yes.
